subheader: Be part of the collectively designed PermaplanT world! You can pay your annual membership fee or earn it through your active participation via Permacoins:

pro.name: Supporting Member
pro.description: As a supporting member, you not only become a legal member of the association and enjoy the community and all the features of the app, but you also enable a person with lower financial means to become a working member. Thank you!

starter.name: Standard Membership
starter.description: With a standard membership, you become a legal member of the association and enjoy the community and the features of the app.

collab.name: Worker Membership
collab.description: You enjoy all features of the app, but you help others to collect Permacoins. If you reach this amount or more by the end of the year, no annual fee in Euro will be charged.

email_text:
